rmi.graph

Interface RMIGraphNode

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RMIGraphNodeImpl

    public interface RMIGraphNode
extends java.rmi.Remote
    An interface of a remotable object which is able to receive data from its neighbors and send it to its neighbors.
    Author:
    cachera brabant

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addNeighbor(RMIGraphNode neighbor) 
      void addNeighbors(java.util.List<RMIGraphNode> neighbors) 
      void clearNeighbors()
      Remove every neighbor of the RMIGraphNode.
      java.lang.String getName() 
      RMIGraphNode getNeighbor(int index) 
      java.util.List<RMIGraphNode> getNeighbors() 
      java.lang.String getTrace()
      Return a String containing the trace of the propogation since its beginning.
      java.lang.String propagate(byte[] data, java.util.List<RMIGraphNode> path)
      Give data as an array of byte to the RMITreeNode in order to propagate to the leaves of the tree.
      void removeNeighbor(int index) 
      void removeNeighbor(RMIGraphNode neighbor) 
      java.lang.String sendDataToNeighbors(byte[] data, java.util.List<RMIGraphNode> path)
      Send data as an array of byte to every children of the RMITreeNode.

      • getTrace

        java.lang.String getTrace()
                          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Return a String containing the trace of the propogation since its beginning.
        Returns:
        The trace of the propogation.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • propagate

        java.lang.String propagate(byte[] data,
                         java.util.List<RMIGraphNode> path)
                           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Give data as an array of byte to the RMITreeNode in order to propagate to the leaves of the tree.
        Parameters:
        data - The data to propagate to the leaves of the tree.
        Returns:
        The trace of the entire propagation.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • sendDataToNeighbors

        java.lang.String sendDataToNeighbors(byte[] data,
                                   java.util.List<RMIGraphNode> path)
                                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Send data as an array of byte to every children of the RMITreeNode. If the node hasn't any neighbors or if every neighbors are in path, put the message in the trace.
        Parameters:
        data - An array of byte containing the data to send to the children.
        Returns:
        The trace of the children receiving the data.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
